name: @scion/microfrontend-platform
description: SCION Microfrontend Platform provides the building blocks for integrating microfrontends based on iframes. It is a pure TypeScript framework allowing to integrate any web content. It comes with a powerful messaging facility for cross-origin intent- or topic-based communication supporting wildcard addressing, request-response message exchange pattern, retained messaging and more. Web content is embedded using a responsive web component which encapsulates the iframe. The component solves many of the cumbersome quirks of iframes and sets up a context in which data can be made available to the embedded content.
